Header: Minister meets demonstrating Non Academics Staff Union members
Content: Several members of the Non Academics Staff  Union demonstrated opposite the Ministry of Local Government and Provincial Councils on the morning of Wednesday August 3. The Non Academics Staff  Union commenced a march from the Fort Railway Station on Wednesday morning against the anomalies existing between employees in national schools and provincial council schools. They marched to the Ministry of Local Government and Provincial Councils and engaged in a demonstration Minister Faiszer Musthpaha visited the location of the demonstration and accompanied all the demonstrators to the Ministry premises to discuss their issues.The Minister held a special meeting with the demonstrators and promised to forward their demands to the Cabinet and seek approval to solve these problems. The demonstrators were also provided with a meal.
